about_the_game:
A jam-packed title containing ten more stories from the world of "Kimi ga Nozomu Eien", including:

  • Extra episodes featuring characters from "Kimi ga Nozomu Eien".
  • The Muv-Nozo short story that takes the characters to the wild world of "Muv-Luv EXTRA".
  • "TRUE LIES," a re-recording of the infamous "Radio Special TRUE LIES"!

Contents Include:

● "The Hill Where Cherry Blossoms Fall" (Part 1 & 2)
Haruka Suzumiya has secret feelings for Takayuki Narumi, but her shy nature stops her from approaching him. One day, Haruka spots Takayuki skipping class and heading to the hill behind the school. She decides to follow him...

A story about Haruka from before the beginning of the game!


● "The Water's Surface Trembles in the Wind"
Mizuki Hayase is a member of the swim team, but she has long hair. Everyone tells her that she needs to cut it off to improve her times, but she always stubbornly refuses. Then, Takayuki Narumi makes a comment that leaves her terribly confused. As she takes an after-practice shower, she starts to wonder...

A story about Mitsuki from before the beginning of the game!


● "TRUE LIES"
Had your fill of untold stories about the heroines of "Kimi ga Nozomu Eien"? Then it's time for "TRUE LIES"!
Witness a chaotic, crazy comedy that has nothing at all to do with the original story!

● "Muv-Nozo"
The ordinary daily life of an average male student, Takayuki Narumi, is suddenly disrupted by the appearance of a beautiful girl in a competition swimsuit! It's a non-stop series of absurd gags that's nothing like you've ever seen before! Can you keep up?!

And 5 more awesome stories!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A jam-packed title containing ten more stories from the world of "Kimi ga Nozomu Eien", including extra episodes featuring the game's characters, and the "Muv-Nozo" short story that takes the characters to the wild world of "Muv-Luv EXTRA"!
